titles.title: A bill to establish the Wasatch National Recreation Area in the State of Utah, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

bill.summary: 5/26/1988--Introduced. Establishes the Wasatch National Recreation Area within the Wasatch-Cache and Uinta National Forests in Utah. Requires the Secretary of Agriculture to permit hunting and fishing on lands and waters within the recreation area.
